text: Juan Alberto Melgar Castro (20 June 1930 â€“ 2 December 1987) was a Honduran military officer. He was the head of state of Honduras from 22 April 1975 to 7 August 1978. He was removed from power by others in the military. Melgar Castro died in San Pedro Sula, Honduras on 2 December 1987 from a heart attack, aged 57. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Presidents of Honduras Category:Generals Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Juan Alberto Melgar Castro
